thread.title: Love for furry friends grows investment interest

title: Love for furry friends grows investment interest
text:
Love for furry friends grows investment interest 4:12pm IST - 01:50 
Gordie Spater has been manufacturing dog harnesses for 15 years out of an office on the furthest northern reaches of the Massachusetts shoreline, but his business is in high demand right now on Wall Street.   
Gordie Spater has been manufacturing dog harnesses for 15 years out of an office on the furthest northern reaches of the Massachusetts shoreline, but his business is in high demand right now on Wall Street.  //reut.rs/2p8WDJE
